pkgmetadata.longdescription: Post-Processing of the Markov Chain Simulated by ChronoModel // Provides a list of functions for the statistical analysis and the post-processing of the Markov Chains simulated by ChronoModel (see http://www.chronomodel.fr for more information). ChronoModel is a friendly software to construct a chronological model in a Bayesian framework. Its output is a sampled Markov chain from the posterior distribution of dates component the chronology.
